definition: surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image
to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots

sentences.english: But he is proud to show off the scars and stitch-marks that cover his belly.
sentences.chinese: 但他却很乐意炫耀自己肚子上的刀疤和缝合的印记。

sentences.english: Markers sof the Anthropocene will surely be visible in the fossil record.
sentences.chinese: 人类世一定会在化石记录中留下的可见的印记。

sentences.english: Farmer Brown's cattle are branded with the letter B.
sentences.chinese: 农场主布朗的牛都烙上了字母“B”的印记。

sentences.english: Someone practiced Indian marks with this pen and ink.
sentences.chinese: 有人用这只笔和墨水练过画印第安印记。

sentences.english: Mark two-tone, pay the memories. One laugh.
sentences.chinese: 深浅不一的印记，付之一笑的回忆。

sentences.english: It is common sense to put the seal to the wax while it is soft.
sentences.chinese: 趁着腊还软的时候印上印记，这个是众所皆知的常识。

sentences.english: The marks appear and disappear with the seasons.
sentences.chinese: 这些印记随着季节的变更时有时无。

sentences.english: Set me as a seal upon thine heart.
sentences.chinese: 求伱将我放在心上如印记。

sentences.english: On this little piggy happiness leaves its traces.
sentences.chinese: 黏人的小猪身上，留下快乐的印记。

sentences.english: An individual synapse is thought to be the minimum unit necessary to establish a memory engram.
sentences.chinese: 突触被认为是形成记忆印记的最小基本单位。

sentences.english: He was not yet sealed in righteousness even though his inclination was toward the good.
sentences.chinese: 他还没有得到义的印记，虽然他的性格趋向于善。

sentences.english: Inflation's repercussions were imprinted on the expansion history of the universe.
sentences.chinese: 膨胀反弹在宇宙的膨胀历史中留有印记。

sentences.english: “This is to mark that I lived in terror under oppression,” read one message.
sentences.chinese: “这是我生活在压迫恐怖下的印记”有一句这么写到。

sentences.english: Imprint deep and shallow, flat with no feeling.
sentences.chinese: 印记深深浅浅，平淡的没有感觉。

sentences.english: Only "commerce" is the best signature of Zhengzhou citys cultural.
sentences.chinese: 惟有“商”，才是郑州城市文化名片印记的首选。

sentences.english: She's the protector of the whole Cage, the one being that keeps Sigil safe.
sentences.chinese: 她是整座鸟笼的守护者，是她保障了印记城的安全。

definition: to brand (cattle etc)/brand/(fig.) to leave a lasting mark/to stigmatize/mark/stamp/stigma
to engrave a seal/stamp mark/to print with carved type/to leave a deep impression
